bridge-type.label: Z-Wave JS Gateway
bridge-type.description: The Z-Wave JS server that acts as a bridge to the Z-Wave network

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of Z-Wave JS server

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port the remote Z-Wave JS server listens on

parameter.name: configurationChannels
parameter.label: Configuration As Channels
parameter.description: When set to `true`, the Z-Wave CommandClass "Configuration" is exposed in openHAB as channels instead of Thing configuration. This allows you to modify the configuration in rules, such as changing codes for locks.

parameter.name: maxMessageSize
parameter.label: Maximum Message Size
parameter.description: The maximum size of the message (in bytes) that the ZWave-JS server can send

thing-type.label: Z-Wave node
thing-type.description: A Z-Wave node provided by Zwave JS
